price: I oni su se između sebe u vjeri podvojili, a svi će se Nama vratiti.
arabic: وَتَقَطَّعُوٓاْ أَمۡرَهُم بَيۡنَهُمۡۖ كُلٌّ إِلَيۡنَا رَٰجِعُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wataqaṭṭaʿū amrahum baynahum kullun ilaynā rājiʿūna
